thread.title: Jennifer & Jerry
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Jennifer & Jerry

author: Jennifer & Jerry
title: Jennifer & Jerry
text: Carlos & Sergio were patient and so helpful! Loved the selection and the prices were competitive. My only complaint is that I couldn't purchase the accessories. I'm so bad at that and everything was decorated so beautifully that I will I could have purchased some of the items I saw. But that's it! We are so excited to get our new furniture tomorrow!
